Standing Talking: simply show the character is talking.
Standing Greeting: only used for the character to greet others.
Standing Arguing: show the character is arguing with others.
Standing Deny: convey the character's rejection or disapproval.
Standing Confident: depict the character's confidence or self-assurance.
Standing Nervous: show the character's nervousness or anxiety.
Joyful Jump: demonstrate the character is extremely happy.
Sit Down: When you need to change the character's state from standing to sitting, you can perform this action.
Sitting Talking: simply show the character is talking.
Sitting Claping: indicate the character agrees or is happy.
Stand Up: When you need to change the character's state from sitting to standing, you can perform this action.
Accelerate: Increase the speed of the vehicle.
Brake: Reduce the speed of the vehicle or bring it to a stop.
Drift: Perform a controlled slide around a corner.
Nitro Boost: Temporarily increase the vehicle's speed using a nitro boost.
Fire Cannon: Launch a projectile from the vehicle's mounted cannon.
Deploy Smoke Screen: Release a smoke screen to obscure visibility for pursuers.
Perform Stunt Jump: Execute a high-speed jump over a ramp or obstacle.
Ram Opponent: Deliberately collide with another vehicle to cause damage.
Evasive Maneuver: Perform a quick maneuver to avoid an incoming attack or obstacle.
Spin Attack: Rotate the vehicle rapidly to strike nearby opponents.
Repair Vehicle: Temporarily halt to repair minor damage to the vehicle.
Activate Shield: Deploy a temporary energy shield to protect the vehicle.
Use Oil Slick: Release oil onto the track to make it slippery for other vehicles.
Perform 360 Spin: Execute a full 360-degree spin for style or evasion.
Target Lock: Lock onto an opponent for a precision attack.
Deploy Decoy: Release a decoy to distract opponents or mislead pursuers.
Activate Turbo Shield: Activate a shield that provides temporary invincibility while boosting speed.
Turbo Drift: Perform a high-speed drift with turbo boost.
EMP Blast: Emit an electromagnetic pulse to disable nearby vehicles.
Deploy Spikes: Release spikes onto the track to puncture tires of pursuing vehicles.
Cloak Mode: Activate stealth mode to become temporarily invisible to opponents.
Auto Repair: Automatically repair minor vehicle damage over time.
Heckle: An action to interrupt or jeer at someone.
Crowd Pleaser: An action to entertain or win over the crowd.
Pole Dancing: A dance performed around a vertical pole.
Victory Pose: A celebratory pose after achieving success.
Dance Celebration: Perform a dance to celebrate a victory or achievement.
Mock Opponent: Perform an action to mock or taunt an opponent.
